title: Erase One Element
description: Erase One Element is a game in which you will need to solve logic and cunning problems. Turn on your wits to solve these tricky riddles. Guess who is a real vampire? Where is the thief hiding? How to save a drowning man? How do I charge my smartphone? All these tasks, as well as a lot of others, you will need to solve in our game! But be careful, otherwise you will erase the excess. All these tricky riddles will help you develop your wits.
instructions: Study the task of the level and swipe the eraser over the picture to erase the excess. When you erase the desired element, you will win!

title: Star Maze
description: Star Maze is a challenging Maze game with 100 levels. Paint your way through a maze in this beautiful puzzle game! Move through the maze to color your tiles and collect all the stars.
instructions: Swipe to move the ball and collect the stars.

title: Ninja Slicer
description: Ninja Slicer - is a relaxing and interesting game that gives you the opportunity to spend your free time in a fun way. Cut grass with the sword avoiding obstacles. Check your agility and break new records by competing with friends. FEATURES: • Simple swipe-to-move controls • Relaxed gameplay • Stress relieving action
instructions: Cut all grass parcels using swipes or arrows.

title: Find Differences Halloween
description: This is a Spot the difference type of puzzle game where players must find differences between two otherwise similar images. Try to find differences using your hawk eyes and tap that otherwise use hint. Unused hints and saved time will give you extra bonus score.
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Halloween Sudoku
description: Sudoku is a famous logic puzzle games. If you like sudoku games, this Halloween Sudoku games is for you. In Halloween Sudoku, you task is to fill all the cells with halloween items. Each row, column or 3x3 cells must contain a halloween item exactly once.
instructions: Use mouse to play this sudoku game.

title: Nonogram Picture Cross Puzzle Game
description: Nonogram Picture Cross Puzzle Game requires your math knowledge and space-imagination skills to work out three difficulties of puzzles. As a typical arcade puzzle game, you need to fill the blank up with the correct locations according to the number tips. Glad you will complete all levels!
instructions: Tap to play.

title: Tailed Monsters — Puzzle
description: A fun puzzle game with a snake monster. Logic snake can replace board puzzles and quests. Puzzle game. Game for adults and children. Cute game for the development of intelligence. Game for boys and girls. Best brain training game 2022!
instructions: Pull the snake monsters by the head or tail so that each one is in the right place. Use your finger/mouse cursor to move the monsters around the field.

title: Torn Pics Jigsaw Halloween
description: Tron Pics Jigsaw Halloween is a different flavor of classical jigsaw game. Arrange the jigsaw pieces of a picture to form the original picture. There are 2 modes in the games. Each mode has 36 levels. You must complete a level within time limits.
instructions: Use any pointing (mouse, touchpad etc) device to play this game.

title: Emoji Guess Puzzle: AI
description: DO YOU SPEAK EMOJI? ???? Show off your skills as an emoji interpreter in this supremely fun and frenetic puzzle game where you have to pick the right set of emojis to express the phrase, saying or movie title that’s written or illustrated above. Solve endless emoji puzzles by matching the right emojis in the right order and sharpen your logic, word association and visual perception skills with hundreds of short, colorful, and often hilarious levels of brain-teasing entertainment. ? Emoji Guess Puzzle is a simple-in-concept but endlessly challenging and amusing puzzle game for smart players of all ages.
instructions: ? Emojinal support: Can’t guess the right answer first try? There’s support at hand in the form of cheeky, helpful hints to prompt you in the right direction and help you understand your emojis better. Plus, you’ll get multiple tries to put your emojis in order, or the satisfaction of getting all the stars when you’re right first time.

title: Catch That Cat
description: This is a skill based puzzle game. You will see a board filled with different cats. You need to find the exact same cat in the board as shown in the panel on left side. Find the cats in each block to complete the game.
instructions: Use mouse or touch-screen to play this game.

title: Spiny maze puzzle
description: Welcome to the Spiny maze puzzle. In this game, you have to put the tiny ball into the hole. But it's not easy you can rotate the circle maze using an Arrow key or touch the screen left half screen to rotate the left side and the right half screen to the rotate right side. The spiny maze puzzle contains 30 challenging levels. play and have fun.
instructions: Rotate the circle maze using an Arrow key or touch the screen left half screen to rotate the left side and the right half screen to the rotate right side.

title: OMG Word Swipe
description: Swipe and connect the letters to form a word from the letter boxes. Find all the required words to solve the puzzle. Earn more score if you have less tries. Use your hints to reveal a letter from the required word.
instructions: Swipe to connect letters. Find all the required words.

title: Is It Golf
description: Is It Golf is a funny golf arcade game with 3D models. According to the rules of golf, you are required to control all starting models including a golf ball, a sheep, a car, a chicken, and a closestool to get to the marked flag at each level. Try to adjust the launching power and avoid the drums for victory!
instructions: Slide to play.

title: Blocks Chain Deluxe
description: Blocks chain deluxe is a simple maze puzzle game in which you need to color whole maze without leaving any block empty. Start from the S block and move through all the blocks of maze till you reach to the last block. If you stuck then tap on Restart Button or start again from S block.
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Master of Donuts
description: Master of Donuts is a fun and addictive sorting puzzle game. Try to sort donuts with delicious topping in stacks until all donuts with the same topping/color are on top of each other. Challenge and exercise your brain and get relaxed before or after a busy, sunny or perfect day and become the Master of Donuts.
instructions: Sort the donuts by color

title: System Puzzle
description: Fix the system from the gaps in it that were formed due to viruses! try yourself as an antivirus. Put the puzzle together, close the hole, and move on to the next challenge! Hundreds of interesting levels will not make you bored!
instructions: Drag and move suitable blocks from the bottom panel to the hole.

title: Fruitways Matching
description: Move the fruits to the blank spaces in order to create a horizontal or vertical row of 3 identical fruits. Use as less moves as possible for more score. To make a fruit move, first tap on it and then tap on any blank tile. If there is any open path between the fruit and its destination, it would travel to the new place. Complete a level before your score reaches to 0. You can use special powers like Bomb and extra score for matching fruits faster.
instructions: Tap the item and the blank tile to move it.

title: Wordle Stack 3D
description: Wordle Stack 3D is a great game to test your vocabulary. Just pick up the letters you guess may be the answer. Then collect all of them to verify! The letters in the correct answer are shown in green! Yellow means the letter is correct and the position is wrong! Challenge it now!
instructions: Tap to play

title: The Kitchen - Find the Differences
description: Try to find all the differences in each picture before the time runs out. Be careful though, do not touch the screen randomly to catch all the differences this way. If you click the wrong area several times, the game is over!
instructions: When you spot a difference between the images touch or click on it

title: Golf Pin
description: Do you like golf games! Pass challenging levels and show your skills with golf game, one of the most popular sports games. Have fun with golf pin game.
instructions: It is played with the mouse.

title: Hidden Birds
description: Hidden Birds is an skill based puzzle game where you need to find all the hidden birds in the forest. You need to complete all 8 challenging levels to win this game.
instructions: Use Mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Twirl
description: Do you like to complete logic puzzles? Then this game is for you! In it you will find many puzzles where you have to show your intelligence, think, calculate and make the right choice.
instructions: You need to drag the figures onto the field. At the same time, with each level, it will be more interesting and interesting for you, because You will meet with a variety of exciting tasks. We wish you only victories!

title: Nine Blocks: Block Puzzle Game
description: It’s a simple yet challenging free block puzzle you won’t be able to put down. Merge cube blocks on the 9x9 grid, which should be familiar to all sudoku fans, to build lines and squares. Strategically stack sudoku blocks made up of cubes on the board to destroy them and keep the board clean.
instructions: Match blocks to remove them by completing lines and cubes. Keep the board clean and beat your high score in this block puzzle!

title: Snake Blocks and Numbers
description: Snake, Blocks and Numbers is an addictive hyper-casual game. It is easy to control but also very challenging. Crawl as far as you can and collect points to grow your length. Gather stars to unlock many cool snake skins. A global leaderboard is supported. Play now and raise your name on the leaderboard!
instructions: Dragging your mouse or finger to move your snake. Collect points to grow, and avoid colliding with the blocks which have big numbers. Gather stars to unlock new cool snake skins in the Shop.

title: Candy Chain Match
description: Connect similar items using touch or mouse. Make a group of 3 or more, horizontally, vertically or diagonally adjacent items to remove net from the blocks. Free all the blocks from net to complete the level. Complete all 36 levels to win this game.
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Lawn Mower Puzzle
description: With the help of a lawn mower you have to mow all the grass on the lawn. Each section of the lawn can only be visited once.
instructions: Click on an unoccupied area of the lawn if it is horizontal or vertical from the lawn mower to mow the grass. To move the lawnmower back, click on the already mown area.

title: Get the Word!
description: You have six attempts to find the hidden word. Start by writing any word. After each guess, the letters will change color to indicate whether they are in the mystery word.
instructions: Find the mystery word. Start by guessing the first word. The color of each cell will give you a hint.

title: Maze & labyrinth
description: Maze & labyrinth - brainteaser game, the real challenge to your intellect! Сollection of mazes and labyrinths, from simple to very complex. Classic and shade mazes type, the ability to download a maze image. Train your logic and intelligence, think, remember, develop your mind and find a way out of the maze.
instructions: Find a way out of the maze. Arrow keys or WASD for a PC or on-screen buttons for mobile devices. Space bar or Ctrl for move back. Large mazes can be scaled and moved across the screen.

title: Alien Home Block collapse
description: This is a twisted block collapse game with interesting puzzles. In each level you will find a UFO which has lost its path in stars. Collapse the star blocks to make a way for the UFO to reach its home planet. There will be 40 challenging levels in this game. Complete all to win the game.
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Match 20 Challenge
description: Match 20 Challenge is a free colorful puzzle online game for boys. The game starts at 5, looks easy until 10, gets fiendish at 15, and challenges you to get to 20. Anyone can learn it, but you'll have to concentrate to make it all the way. TIt is a very good skill-based game that tests both reaction time and dexterity. Can you get to Twenty?
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: 3D Touch
description: This is a logic game where you have to tap the cubes generating possible paths. You can't go back, your goal is for everyone to be selected. There are 100 levels with gradual difficulty. You will be able to collect coins and buy new skins to customize your gameplay.
instructions: Tap the cubes generating possible paths. Select them all.

title: Odd Elimination
description: It is a very interesting Photo Puzzle game, in which you need to find odd pic from a group of 5 pics. If you catch the wrong pic your score will be deducted. If you are stuck with puzzle you can also reveal right pic by watching Reward AD. Complete all 60 challenging levels to win this game.
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Metazoa Jigsaw
description: Metazoa Jigsaw is a different flavor of classical jigsaw game. Arrange the jigsaw pieces of a picture to form the original picture. There are 2 modes in the games. Each mode has 24 levels. You must complete a level within time limits.
instructions: Use any pointing (mouse, touchpad etc) device to play this game.

title: Aquatic Word Search
description: Find the word in straight line of blocks (Horizontally, vertically or diagonally with any direction), press the block showing the first alphabet and move till you come to the last alphabet of the word. Find all the words displayed in left panel to complete a level. Complete all level to win this game.
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Blocku Golf 2
description: Welcome to the Blocku Golf 2 game. This game is about the adventure of a red ball based on mini golf. Hundreds of exciting, easy and difficult levels are waiting for you. Can you pass everything? Simple, but at the same time complex gameplay will drag you out for a long time. Compete with your friends, go further and further. Unlock new and new levels. In the game Blocku Golf 2 every level. All you have to do is kick the ball into the hole. That's all ! But there is one rule: in order to pass the level, you will only have 5 values. Only 5 ratings! In addition, you are waiting for other obstacles on the way to success. These are moving platforms, blocks, chasms, sharp saws and explosive TNT. How do you like that? But first of all, Blocku Golf 2 is a very addicting and fun game that combines minimalism and addictive gameplay, steeped in hardcore level passing, like in the good old Bounce or Gravity Defied. Hurry up to pass the level after the increase!
instructions: Use the mouse or touchscreen to control. To throw the ball, you need to pull the indicator like in the game Angry Birds, like a slingshot. You have 5 attempts to hit the ball into the hole. You can restart the level if you didn't succeed, to do this, use the refresh button in the upper right corner. Good luck !

title: Numbers
description: Test your skills in numbers. Can you beat your friends in a fast game of precision and speed? Challenge yourself or your friends to see who is the best.
instructions: Start the game, pick your game mode, try to bear your highscore!

title: Rubek
description: Rubek is a minimalist color based puzzle game. Roll a cube to pick up and match correct colors on the floor, as you make your way to reach the end point while figuring out a way to solve the puzzles. Play through 70+ handcrafted levels of mind bending difficulty and collect stars to compete on the global leaderboards.
instructions: Instructions Use Arrow keys or WADS keys to move the cube Can Also be moved using click and drag

title: Jigsaw Puzzle Horses Edition
description: A wide selection of high quality free jigsaw puzzles on horseback will bring hours of fun to the whole family while playing this game. Whether it's a towering stallion or a small pony, for kids and adults who love horse games, "Jigsaw Puzzle Horses Edition" is for everyone! With 49 different jigsaw puzzles featuring beautiful pictures of horses, you and your kids are sure to find something to enjoy. Enjoy 49 different puzzles: easy for kids, challenging for adults
instructions: put togheter several pieces to discover the photo puzzle

title: Zombie Killer Draw Puzzle
description: Zombie Killer Draw Puzzle is a free online game for boys. You will be trapped in a room full of zombies. If you want to escape successfully, you must kill all the zombies inside. When attacking zombies, you should also pay attention to protecting yourself. There are many kinds of zombies, so you must be careful and then seize the opportunity to kill them quickly. Can you accurately calculate and control your line to kill all the zombies with one draw?
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Join Blocks 2048 Number Puzzle
description: Play Join Blocks puzzle today and every day - it's the best, free 2048 classic number puzzle game! Escape to the most relaxing 2048 number blocks merging game around! Tap, shoot and join x2 blocks up to 2048 and more.
instructions: Click the number to make the number +1. When the three adjacent numbers are the same, it can be eliminated. Continuous elimination will trigger the combo effect.

title: Trader Rush
description: Collect items to sell at right time! Be careful about timing or you may lose. Wait a prize at the end! You need to deserve it so make right decisions at trading.
instructions: Use mouse to control character

title: Wortsuche Rätsel
description: Wortsuche ist eines der besten Wortspiele, um Ihr Gehirn, Ihren Wortschatz und Ihre Mustererkennung zu trainieren. Das Ziel der Wortsuche ist es, alle Wörter zu finden, die neben dem Rätselraster aufgelistet sind. Die Wörter sind im Puzzlegitter versteckt und gehen in alle Richtungen: horizontal, vertikal, diagonal sowie rückwärts. Gehen Sie zum Kalender, um weitere Rätsel zu finden. Kommen Sie jeden Tag für mindestens ein paar Minuten zurück, um Ihren Geist und Ihr Gehirn zu trainieren!
instructions: Finden Sie Wörter, indem Sie mit dem Finger darüber wischen oder indem Sie mit der Maus Wörter innerhalb des Puzzlerasters ziehen und hervorheben. Wenn Sie Hilfe benötigen, verwenden Sie die Hinweisfunktion (unter der Glühbirne)

title: Stumble Boys Match
description: Stumble Guy Match is a variety game for many people to experience the excitement of variety! A group of players compete with you in the same arena, with different playing methods round after round, eliminate the players who fail to meet the standard, and determine the last one to win!
instructions: WASD controls direction movement, and space controls jumping

title: Birds Hex Jigsaw
description: Birds Hex Jigsaw is a different flavor of classical jigsaw game. Arrange the hex pieces of a picture to form the original picture. There are 2 modes in the games. Each mode has 24 levels. You must complete a level within time limits.
instructions: Use any pointing (mouse, touchpad etc) device to play this game.

title: Candy Rain 7
description: Candy Rain 7, one of greatest Match 3 games of all time! It’s the only Match 3 Game to have the lucky 7 sequels! Because of its huge popularity, the players simply asked for more. Candy Rain 7 boasts more levels, more candies, more waffles, more chests of coins and fun packed saga map to enjoy!
instructions: Find, match and catch candies, waffles and chests full of coins. Use powerful boosters and create rewarding combos to beat the high score in every single level! And the best thing about it? All of this fun is still absolutely calorie free and doesn't cost money either! Play and enjoy Candy Rain 7 now for free!

title: Traffic Control Time
description: In this game, control traffic by clicking clocks with the correct time to activate lanes. Four clock sets control traffic lights. Correct taps make the signal green; others turn red. Manage traffic, answer questions, and avoid congestion within a time limit. Wrong taps lead to level failure. The game gets harder as you progress. How high can you score?
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Sweet Boom - Puzzle Game
description: Colorful candies with fun animations will definitely hook you in the Sweet Boom puzzle, Embark on a journey through the world of sweets. Sweet Boom - is a puzzle game for up your brain. Pop the sweet ones to complete the levels. But the tap's are limited, so count. Cute monsters look like a jelly. Chess background. Game for children and adults. New game 2022!
instructions: Tap "Left Mouse Button" to pop the sweet.

title: ZUMAR DELUXE
description: As an explorer in the Zumar Deluxe , is only one going to be blocked by the marbles and your mission is shooting to blast all them. You have to complete all the levels in challenge mode, help frog marble defense in jungle marble and try to get three stars in each level.
instructions: * How to play: * 1. Touch the screen where you want to shoot. 2. Match 3 or more same marbles to eliminate them. Destroy all the marble lines in the chain before it hits the end. 3. Marble shooting more combos and marble shooter chains to get the highest score, try to get three stars in each level in marble games!

title: Match Tile 3D
description: Match Tile 3D is an addictive puzzle, not only connect your brain to logical thinking but also is a fun triple matching game which is easy for everyone to play!
instructions: There will be a lot of 3d objects in the hidden objects games, which can be matched and cleared for the the same objects, similar to the mechanism of match 3 games.

title: Clock Puzzle for Kids
description: Clock Puzzle is a fun game to learn how to tell time. This elementary activity is great fun for all children in the computer lab or at home! Kids will learn by trying to guess the time on the clocks. Kids often develop misconceptions about concepts in mathematics, including time. It is important to help them get over those misconceptions. The game gives students an opportunity to learn more.
instructions: Tell the time to win more points.
